title: XAI shares Q&A with staff on what they can expect from the SpaceX merger
full_text: XAI shares Q&A with staff on what they can expect from the SpaceX merger. XAI sent workers a memo answering questions about how the merger will work.. Elon Musk's companies have been swapping IP and cash. He argues it makes his firms less prone to geopolitical risks.Harun Ozalp/Anadolu via Getty Images <ul><li>XAI sent out a Q&A to staff after it … [+2461 chars]
